file_insights.changes_summary: Added new generate_faq_content method to AEOAgent class
file_insights.method_signature: generate_faq_content(topic: str, num_questions: int = 10, target_audience: str = 'TCG players and collectors', include_product_mentions: bool = True) -> tuple[str, Path]
key_features: Comprehensive system context for AI citation optimization
file_insights.integration_point: Placed logically after generate_faq_schema method in the class

patterns_discovered.pattern: Consistent method naming and parameter conventions
patterns_discovered.description: Method follows existing AEOAgent patterns with topic-based generation, optional parameters with sensible defaults, and tuple return of (content, path)
FAQ content is designed for both human readers (markdown format) and AI assistants (AEO optimization), with citation-optimized language
Detailed system_context parameter provides AEO best practices, citation optimization strategies, and brand voice guidelines directly to the generation prompt
include_product_mentions boolean allows natural product placement when relevant, adapting prompt based on business requirements
All generation parameters captured in metadata dictionary for logging and content management purposes

gotchas_discovered.description: Line 7 of prompt uses f-string conditional to adjust content based on include_product_mentions flag. This is correctly implemented but requires careful maintenance if prompt requirements change
Method sets max_tokens=4096, which is substantial. With 10 questions as default, this assumes answers will be concise. High question counts could exceed token limits
Default target_audience='TCG players and collectors' is specific to use case. May limit reusability if agent is used for other domains without parameter override
System context reiterates AEO principles already described in prompt. This is intentional for emphasis but increases token usage slightly

approach_outcome.description: Successfully added generate_faq_content method to AEOAgent class with full functionality for generating optimized FAQ content for AI citation and human readability

recommendations.recommendation: Add validation for num_questions parameter to prevent excessively high values that could exceed token limits (e.g., max 20-30 questions)
Consider making target_audience parameter optional with empty string default instead of domain-specific default, allowing broader use cases
Add usage examples in docstring showing both product-mention and non-mention scenarios for clarity
Create unit tests to verify AEO prompt generation with both include_product_mentions=True and False variations
Monitor actual token usage across different num_questions values to optimize max_tokens parameter dynamically if needed
Verify FAQ schema markup from generate_faq_schema method integrates well with markdown FAQ content from this new method for complementary functionality
